children.text: CSS Test: allowed page break margin handling inside table rows
The letters 'a', 'b' and 'c' should appear below this line on the same page. A single blue outline should wrap around both lines of text.

rects.text: The letters 'a', 'b' and 'c' should appear below this line on the same page. A single blue outline should wrap around both lines of text.

children.text: The letters 'a' through 'd' should be printed across this page and the next.

rects.text: The letters 'a' through 'd' should be printed across this page and the next.
